org.arkanos.pivotal_analytics.printers

Class CommonHTML

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arkanos.pivotal_analytics.printers.CommonHTML

  • public class CommonHTML
extends java.lang.Object
    The CommonHTML class handles constant HTML code. Basically everything that is common to all pages is here. Each method return an entire and complete HTML Tag. This class is entirely based on static behavior!
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matheus Borges Teixeira

    • Constructor Summary

      CommonHTML()

      static java.lang.String getBasicHeaders(java.lang.String title)

      Returns the footer which contains all copyright notices.
      static java.lang.String getMenu(java.lang.String indent)
      Returns the top menu which contains links to control and other pages.
      static java.lang.String ticketTable(java.lang.String title, TicketSet content, java.lang.String indent)
      Returns a set of stories wrapped around a HTML <table> tag.
      static java.lang.String wrapWindow(java.lang.String secondaryclass, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String content, java.lang.String indent)

    • Method Detail

      • getMenu

        public static java.lang.String getMenu(java.lang.String indent)
        Returns the top menu which contains links to control and other pages.
        Parameters:
        indent - defines the string which will prefix all printed lines.
        Returns:
        the complete <div> containing the top menu in form of a String.

      • getFooter

        public static java.lang.String getFooter(java.lang.String indent)
        Returns the footer which contains all copyright notices.
        Parameters:
        indent - defines the string which will prefix all printed lines.
        Returns:
        the complete <div> containing the copyright notices in form of a String.

      • getBasicHeaders

        public static java.lang.String getBasicHeaders(java.lang.String title)
        Returns the generic headers with a given title.
        Parameters:
        title - defines the desired page title.
        Returns:
        the whole HTML <head> tag in form of a String.

      • wrapWindow

        public static java.lang.String wrapWindow(java.lang.String secondaryclass,
                          java.lang.String title,
                          java.lang.String content,
                          java.lang.String indent)
        Returns a particular content wrapped inside a HTML <div> tag. The resulting <div> models a window-like view of the content. This method ignores indentation for content itself.
        Parameters:
        secondaryclass - defines a auxiliary CSS class.
        title - defines the title of the <div> window.
        content - specifies the content of the window.
        indent - defines the string which will prefix all printed lines.
        Returns:
        the whole HTML <div> tag in form of a String.

      • ticketTable

        public static java.lang.String ticketTable(java.lang.String title,
                           TicketSet content,
                           java.lang.String indent)
        Returns a set of stories wrapped around a HTML <table> tag. The state of the story is mapped in CSSs classes. The type of the story is displayed in an icon. Only titles and labels are printed. All text offer direct links to Pivotal.
        Parameters:
        title - defines a title to be given in this window-like table.
        content - specifies which stories are to be printed.
        indent - defines the string which will prefix all printed lines.
        Returns:
        the whole HTML <table> tag in form of a String.
